sentences.english: Electrode for arc welding consists of the core and the coat.
sentences.chinese: 電弧焊的焊條是由焊芯和藥皮兩個部分組成的。

sentences.english: A new detecting method for lack of manual weld is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種對手工電弧焊進行漏焊檢測的新方法。

sentences.english: Inert gas arc weld the spring strut mount.
sentences.chinese: 惰性氣體電弧焊減震器支座。

sentences.english: The most widely used industrial welding method is arc welding.
sentences.chinese: 電弧焊是工業上最常用的燒焊方法。

sentences.english: Perhaps I need to pull apart another SCR and try the arc welding approach.
sentences.chinese: 也許我需要把除了另一可控硅和審判電弧焊接的辦法。

sentences.english: Is used as an ordinary arc soldering power source, safely, reliable and easy to use.
sentences.chinese: 一種普通的電弧焊接電源，安全可靠，易於使用。

sentences.english: Manual arc welding is one of the most commonly applied welding processes in fabricating steel structure.
sentences.chinese: 手工電弧焊是鋼結構製造中最通用的焊接方法之一。

sentences.english: The problem of automatic surfacing with arc welding of worn machine parts is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了對磨損機械零件進行自動電弧焊堆焊的問題。

sentences.english: The ceramic lined pipes were welded by arc welding process .
sentences.chinese: 採用電弧焊接方法焊接陶瓷內襯複合鋼管。

sentences.english: For inert-gas arc welding, plasma welding, cutting.
sentences.chinese: 惰性氣體保護電弧焊接，等離子焊接，切割。

sentences.english: It gives a reference to automatic arc welding tracking technique.
sentences.chinese: 爲電弧焊的自動跟蹤技術提供參考。

sentences.english: The manual arc welding normally refers to the manual welding using coated electrode.
sentences.chinese: 手工電弧焊通常是指採用藥皮焊條的手工焊接法。

sentences.english: Galvanized sheet is readily spot- or seam-welded, but arc gas welding will boil off the zinc coating.
sentences.chinese: 鍍鋅板上有焊點或焊縫，但是電弧焊會燒掉鋅層。
